title: WATCH: SRK's daughter Suhana turns Cinderella for a school play, video goes viral : Celebrities, News - India Today
text:
A video posted by Suhana Khan FC (@suhana.khan) on Feb 8, 2017 at 10:31am PST 
The video of Suhana performing has gone viral within a few days. It is for the first time that people have a got a glimpse of this 16-year-old's acting skills. 
Earlier, SRK had revealed that Suhana is keen to join Bollywood. In an interview to PTI, Shah Rukh had said, "My daughter wants to learn acting, but I don't know which institute in India I should send her to. We don't have any good acting school. One of my dream projects is to be able to create an institute where youngsters can come and learn professional acting, techniques of acting, different styles of acting."
